message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value and quality. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $18000 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $15000. This is a great compromise, considering the product's value and quality. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $15000. I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. Can you consider that price?

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, and I'm willing to negotiate further. I can offer it to you for $14500. This is a reasonable compromise, considering the product's value and quality. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $14500. I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. Can you consider that price?
I'm getting close to meeting you in the middle, Bob! I can offer it to you for $13750. This is a great compromise, considering the product's value and quality. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $13750. I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. Can you consider that price?
I'm getting close to the bottom line, Bob! I can offer it to you for $12800. This is a great deal, considering the product's value and quality. What do you think?
I appreciate your efforts to meet me at a price I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $12500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?
